BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE TOM AND FRANCES LEACH FOUNDATION INC

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RecipientPersonNm: THE TOM AND FRANCES LEACH FOUNDATIO
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: APPLICANTS SUBMIT LETTER PROPOSALS INDICATING FUND UTILIZATION IF GRANTED. THE LEACH FOUNDATION PROVIDES GRANT APPLICATION FORMS PRESCRIBED BY THE IRS.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: GRANTS ARE GIVEN ONLY TO ORGANIZATIONS WITH 501(C)(3) STATUS. PREFERENCE IS GIVEN TO ORGANIZATIONS IN THE UPPER MIDWEST.

GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: ASSISTANCE FOR WOMEN/FAMILIES OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE/SEXUAL ASSAULT.

MENTOR MATCH PROGRAM WILL PLACE CHILDREN AT-RISK FROM SINGLE PARENT HOMES WITH SCREENED CARING ADULT VOLUNTEERS. VOLUNTEERS ARE PROFESSIONALLY- SUPPORTED ROLE MODELS FOR 20 CHILDREN AT-RISK. FUNDING NEEDED FOR A SOCIAL/STAFF WORKERS TIME REQUIRED TO COMPLETE EACH MENTOR MATCH AND ALL THE NECESSARY CASEWORK EVALUATIONS.
UNDERWITE SALARY OF DIRECTOR WITH FIVE PERFORMANCES SCHEDULED FOR THE CURRENT CONCERT SEASON.
SUPPORT THE 2015-2016 SEASON WHICH INCLUDES SIX SUBSCRIPTION CONCERTS
SPONSORSHIP OF EXHIBITS AND STUDENT EXHIBITS FOR BISMARCK PUBLIC HIGH SCHOOLS.

FUNDS COVER A PART-TIME PERSON TO COORDINATE PROGRAM & OVERSEE MEAL DELIVERY BY VOLUNTEERS. THIS GROUP DOES NOT RECEIVE ANY FEDERAL FUNDS FOR MEALS, THEY SERVE ANYONE IN NEED. PROVIDE MEALS 5 DAYS A WEEK FOR ELDERLY OR HANDICAPPED PERSONS.
TOM AND FRANCES LEACH MEMORIAL MUSIC SCHOLARSHIP AWARDED FOR OUTSTANDING STUDENT PARTICIPATION, PERFORMANCE, AND DEVELOPMENT OF MUSIC EDUCATION.

GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.RecipientPersonNm: BOY SCOUTS OF AMERICA NORTHERN LIGH
GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: BISMARCK COUNCIL SERVICE CENTER SERVES NEEDS OF LOCAL SCOUT PROGRAMS IN BISMARCK - MANDAN AND SURROUNDING AREA.
ELEMENTARY CONCERT SERIES FOR 2ND & 3RD GRADE STUDENTS IN BURLEIGH & MORTON COUNTIES.THE ANNUAL EVENT DRAWS 1,600 STUDENTS AND EDUCATORS TOGETHER FOR THE SPRING CONCERT.
CAPITAL IMPROVEMENTS FOR A NEW SHELTER TO PROVIDE A SAFE AND PROPER ENVIRONMENT FOR THE ANIMALS AND THE PEOPLE THAT CARE FOR THEM.
IMPACT CREATIVE ARTS PROGRAM FOR SHELTERED AT-RISK YOUTH. PROVIDE A MENTORING PROGRAM WITH LOCAL ARTISTS TO DEVELOP SKILLS AND EXPLORE THE WORLD IN A DIFFERENT MEDIUM.
GENERAL OPERATIONS COSTS IN ND - WORK WITH YOUTH IN THE AREA OF SPORTS TO ENCOURAGE, EQUIP, AND EMPOWER COACHES AND ATHLETS TO MAKE AN IMPACT THROUGH CORE VALUES OF INTEGRITY, SERVICE, AND TEAMWORK.

WORK MENTORSHIP PROGRAM - CENTER PROVIDES HANDS-ON SCIENCE EDUCATION PRESENTED TO PUBLIC BY HIGH SCHOOL AND COLLEGE STUDENTS WHO SHARE INTERACTIVE EXHIBITS AND DISPLAYS. STUDENTS IN THE PROGRAM RECEIVE PART-TIME WORKING OPPORTUNITIES TO LEARN BASIC WORK SKILLS FROM TRAINED STAFF MEMBERS.
SUPPORT OUTREACH EFFORTS TO RURAL COMMUNITIES AND SUPPORT TRAINING FOR ADULT VOLUNTEERS.

CONTINUED SUPPORT OF EXISTING JC TOM AND FRANCES LEACH FOUNDATION SCHOLARSHIP FUND WITH CASH AWARDS MADE ON ANNUAL BASIS TO A STUDENT WHO WILL ACHIEVE A DEGREE DURING THE AWARD YEAR. FOR ARTS, HUMANITIES, OR NURSING STUDENTS.
SUPPORT CONGREGATE & HOME-DELIVERED MEALS TO KEEP SENIORS IN GOOD HEALTH AND PROVIDE SOCIAL ACTIVITIES.
SUPPORT FOR THE KIDS BACKPACK PROGRAM WHICH PROVIDES AT-RISK SCHOOL AGE YOUTH WITH FOOD FOR TIMES WHEN THEY ARE NOT AT SCHOOL.

FFA LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT CONFERENCE FOR "GREENHANDS" - A MOTIVATIONAL AND LEADERSHIP PROGRAM FOR 1ST YEAR FFA MEMBERS STRESSING LEADERSHIP - CITIZENSHIP DEVELOPMENT, GOAL SETTING, DEALING WITH PEER PRESSURE, PERSONAL VALUES, AND CAREERS.
SPONSOR CELEBRATION OF TREES FUNDRAISER TO COVER SPECIAL NEEDS OR ITEMS AND EVENTS THAT ARE NOT FUNDED BY STATE FOR NEEDY UNPRVILEGED YOUTH/ADULTS.
CAPITAL IMPROVEMENTS FOR THE "STONE SOUP KITCHEN" PROGRAM UPGRADES TO MEET HEALTH AND BUILDING REGULATIONS AND INCREASE THE ABILITY TO SERVE MEALS.

GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.RecipientPersonNm: NORTH DAKOTA SADD INC B-M CHAPTER
GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: SUPPORT THE GENERAL OPERATIONS OF THE BISMARCK-MANDAN CHAPTER. THIS PROGRAM EMPOWERS YOUTH TO ADDRESS IMPORTANT ISSUES IN THEIR LIVES SUCH AS ALCOHOL/DRUG/TOBACCO USE, IMPAIRED DRIVING, SUICIDE, AND SEXUAL BEHAVIOR WITH POSITIVE WAYS TO HELP THEM MAKE BETTER CHOICES AND DECISIONS.

GENERAL OPERATION OF THE AFTER-SCHOOL PROGRAM AT THE COMMUNITY CENTER WITH GYM ACTIVITIES, TUTORING, COMPUTER LAB AND OTHER SERVICES WHICH MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE TO PARTICIPANTS BASED ON ECONOMIC RESTRAINTS.

EXPANDING ART EDUCATION PROGRAMS THROUGHOUT THE CITY BY OFFERING THEM IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE BISMARCK PARKS AFTER SCHOOL PROGRAMS. FUNDS ALLOW STUDENTS WHO OTHERWISE COULDN'T AFFORD TO ATTEND CLASSES TO PARTICIPATE.
GENERAL OPERATIONAL COSTS TO PROMOTE THE SERVICES TO THE COMMUNITY SO MORE SENIORS HAVE THE ADVANTAGE OF ACCESS TO ASSISTANCE WHILE MAINTAINING THEIR RESIDENCES.
GENERAL OPERATING BUDGET FOR YOUTH MINISTRY PROGRAMS. TRAIN STAFF AND VOLUNTEER LEADERS TO BE POSITIVE MENTORS AND ROLE MODELS.

OPERATION COSTS FOR THE SCHOOL YEAR 'EXPANDED HOURS' PROGRAM. FUNDING IS USED TO DEFRAY SALARY BUDGET FOR HIRING/RETAINING OF QUALIFIED DIRECT SERVICE PERSONNEL FOR SPECIALIZED AYCARE OF CHILDREN 0-12 WITH MULTIPLE MENTAL OR PHYSICAL CHALLENGES, CHILDREN CONSIDERED AS AT-RISK ALONG WITH THEIR SIBLINGS.
CAPITAL IMPROVEMENT FOR A 7,000 SQUARE FOOT ADDITION TO PROVIDE AN ADDITIONAL 16-BED INPATIENT CARE FACILITY.

GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: ADOPT A WISH PROGRAM - GRANT ONE CHILD'S WISH IN ND; ORGANIZATION GRANTS WISHES OF CHILDREN WITH LIFE-THREATENING MEDICAL CONDITIONS GIVING THEM HOPE AND JOY.
CONSTRUCTION OF A LIFE SKILLS CENTER IN MEDORA TO CENTRALIZE EMPLOYEE TRAINING AND EDUCATION, EMPLOYEE DINING, GENERAL STORAGE, AND LAUNDRY.
STUDENT SCHOLARSHIP FOR STUDENTS IN NEED OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE.
CAPITAL FUNDING ON A CLASSROOM IN SCIENCE LABORATORY BUILDING.4TH PMT ON 5 YR PLEDGE.
CAPITAL IMPROVEMENT, KIDNEY DIALYSIS CENTER EXPANSION, ADD 8 STATIONS FOR DIALYSIS. FINAL PMT OF 5 YR PLEDGE.

FUNDING TO OFFSET OPERATIONAL COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH VOLUNTEER WORK FORCE AS THEY ASSIST FAMILIES OUTSIDE THEIR HOME AREAS. PROVIDE PLANTING, HARVESTING, AND HAYING ASSISTANCE TO FARM FAMILIES THAT HAVE EXPERIENCED A MAJOR INJURY, ILLNESS OR NATURAL DISASTER.
SUPPORT CAPITAL IMPROVEMENTS AT FACILITY FOR ADDICTS WHO WANT TO ACHIEVE A DRUG-FREE LIFE.
SUPPORT HEARING AND SPEECH SERVICES FOR CHILDREN.
FUTURE COMMITMENT: SUPPORT CAPITAL IMPROVEMENTS AT FACILITY FOR ADDICTS WHO WANT TO ACHIEVE A DRUG-FREE LIFE. 1 PAYMENT REMAINING ON PLEDGE.
ADDITIONAL FUNDING FOR STAGE/SOUND PROJECT. 3RD OF 5 PAYMENTS.
FUTURE COMMITMENT ADDITIONAL FUNDING FOR STAGE/SOUND PROJECT. 1 PAYMENT OF 5 REMAINING.
OFFSET TRAVEL COSTS FOR THE PARTICIPANTS WHO TRAVEL TO BISMARCK-MANDAN FOR ONE OF THE STATE EVENTS.
